rows.label: qst101503_msg0001
rows.name: Gramps, look! This Divine Beast's still alive!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0002
rows.name: Ah, so it is!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmmm... Ah... Yes, you've been through
the wars, haven't you?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0004
rows.name: You can understand it?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0005
rows.name: Just about!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0006
rows.name:
It said it was attacked by monsters
and got beached here.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0007
rows.name: Its companions weren't quite as lucky.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0008
rows.name: Oh...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0009
rows.name:
Think we can haul it over
to Umon's place?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0010
rows.name:
It could be the best thing for him, Rex.
Better than leaving him alone like that
in any case.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0011
rows.name:
Can you still remember how to make
friends with a Divine Beast?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0012
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0013
rows.name: How do I tame a Divine Beast...?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0014
rows.name: Take control as a Driver.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0015
rows.name: Give it a Green Pollen Orb.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0016
rows.name: Give it a Melodious Melon.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0101
rows.name: That's how they do it in Superbia...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0102
rows.name:
Come on, Rex. Umon asked us once
before to rein a Divine Beast in for him. What
was it you had to use?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0103
rows.name: Ah! It was a Green Pollen Orb, right?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0104
rows.name:
There you go. That's the Nopon way
of doing it. Cute, as you'd expect.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0131
rows.name: Exactly so!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0132
rows.name:
Hehe... Nopon sure have some
interesting customs, huh?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0133
rows.name:
It's a sight better than what those
Superbians do, for sure!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0171
rows.name:
You just picked that because you
liked the sound of it, didn't you?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0172
rows.name:
It just seemed like the sort of thing it
might like.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0201
rows.name:
Hang on, I think I've still got a Green
Pollen Orb kicking about somewhere...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0202
rows.name: Here. Grub's up!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0203
rows.name:
It's asking for more, Rex. Must be
pretty hungry.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0204
rows.name:
Ah, greedy guts!
Well, that's the last of them.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0205
rows.name: It's cheered up quite a bit though!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0206
rows.name: Hmmm! Very interesting!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0207
rows.name: Says it's happy to tug boats.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0208
rows.name: Great!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0209
rows.name: Okay! Let's get to Umon's Shipyard!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0210
rows.name:
Hrm... Could be the same one who
attacked the Divine Beasts!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0211
rows.name:
So it saw this one was still alive and
now it's coming back to finish it off?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0212
rows.name:
Rex! Looks like you'd better take care
of it!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0213
rows.name: Got it! Everyone! Get ready!
